DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study effect multicomponent lifestyle intervention include partial meal replacement mean prevent excessive gestational weight gain obese woman . The primary hypothesis intervention reduce rate gestational weight gain compare standard care .
DOC.brief_title: Preventing Excessive Gestational Weight Gain Obese Women
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Over 18 year old < 16 week gestation BMI > = 25 Willing consent Pregnant Twins Untreated medical psychological problem Inability physically active
